Title: माइंडफुल मोमेंट्स Mindful Moments | New Talk Show by Brahma Kumaris | Every Sat & Sun at 5:00 pm
Description:
माइंडफुल मोमेंट्स, ब्रह्माकुमारीज़ द्वारा प्रस्तुत एक विचारशील टॉक शो, जहाँ जागरूकता और प्रेरणा का संगम होता है। इस मंच पर मिलिए समाज के विभिन्न क्षेत्रों से प्रभुद्ध व्यक्तित्वों से।
 🕔 हर शनिवार और रविवार, शाम 5 बजे
----------------------------
Step into Mindful Moments, a thought-provoking talk show by the Brahma Kumaris, where wisdom meets mindfulness. Join us as we engage with eminent personalities from diverse fields. 
🕔Every Saturday & Sunday at 5PM

Title: Sister BK Sudha Rani Gupta honored with Pravasi Bharatiya Samman Award 2025 #PBD2025 #brahmakumaris
Description:
Sister BK Sudha Rani Gupta receive the "Pravasi Bharatiya Samman Award 2025" from Hon’ble President of India, Smt. Droupadi Murmu, at Bhubaneswar during Pravasi Bharatiya Divas 2025.

Recognized for her outstanding contributions to education and community service in Russia, this honor highlights Brahma Kumaris' dedication to spreading Indian spiritual values and Rajyoga teachings globally.

Heartiest congratulations, Sister Sudha Didi!

Title: World Meditation Day from UK  | Live with Sister Jayanti - Brahma Kumaris
Description:
This 21st December will be the first ever United Nations designated World Meditation Day. The Winter Solstice Day will see people around the globe united in meditation for inner peace and global harmony, to honour the adoption of this groundbreaking resolution. 

The UN maintains that modern science confirms the numerous benefits of meditation, and its profound impact on our lives. It is rooted in ancient practices and is an effective tool to achieve inner transformation and peace in the modern day.

Title: Srishti Mahajan | Living a Spiritual Life in a Modern World  | Empowering the Self | Experience
Description:
In this heartfelt video, Srishti Mahajan, a professional in the renewable energy sector with the Indian government, shares her transformative experience at a Brahma Kumaris retreat. Initially unsure of what to expect, Srishti and her family embarked on this journey with open minds, hoping for a change in the way they lead their lives.

After three days of immersion in morning meditation sessions and meaningful interactions with fellow participants, Srishti reflects on the key takeaway from the retreat: it was both inspirational and transformational. The teachings she received, though familiar from her childhood through satsangs and the wisdom of her grandparents, were now presented with logic, structure, and real-life examples, making them more impactful than ever.

One of the most eye-opening aspects of the retreat was learning that it is possible to live a spiritually fulfilled life while actively participating in society, as demonstrated by a doctor who balances both worlds beautifully. This new understanding left Srishti with a strong sense of faith and belief in the Brahma Kumaris community and their mission to help individuals reconnect with the core values they've lost on their journey.

Srishti expresses deep gratitude towards the sevadharis (volunteers) who patiently answered her many questions, and she looks forward to integrating the valuable lessons from this retreat into her daily life. Join Srishti in this inspiring reflection on spiritual growth, self-discovery, and the power of community.

Title: Promo| Climate Wisdom Live Series from COP 29 Baku - Sister Jayanti | Brahma Kumaris @brahmakumaris
Description:
🌍✨ Live from COP29 Baku, Sister Jayanti invites all environment lovers to join *Climate Wisdom* – a powerful talk series featuring global experts and spiritual guides. 🌱💚 Dive into insightful discussions on how we can blend science and spirituality to protect our planet. Don’t miss this opportunity to learn, connect, and take meaningful action! 

Date: 11th nov to 22nd Nov 2024
Time: 7 PM (AZT) | 3 PM (GMT) | 8:30 PM (IST) | 10 AM (EDT)

Highlights:
- Thought-provoking discussions with global leaders in spirituality and environmental science.
- Practical wisdom to inspire personal responsibility and positive action for our planet.
- Insights into how mindfulness, inner peace, and sustainable practices impact the environment.

Tune in daily for real-time updates, reflections, and a new vision for a sustainable world. Let’s elevate the climate conversation together!

Stay Connected | Subscribe Now to follow our journey at COP 29 and discover how inner transformation can drive lasting environmental change.

Title: Shivangi Bhayana | A Spiritual Experience : Connecting Through Silence and Music | Mansarovar
Description:
In this inspiring video, Shivangi Bhayana shares her transformative experience at a retreat held at Man Sarovar, a campus of the Brahma Kumaris headquarters. She reflects on the profound concept of silence as a language, emphasizing its importance in communication and self-expression.

Shivangi discusses how often we express ourselves verbally, yet there's an unspoken depth that silence can convey. Her retreat experience, her first ever, was truly life-changing. With enlightening talks from various speakers, including Bala bhai, BK Usha Didi, and BK Asha Didi, each session offered unique insights and teachings that left her feeling blessed and enriched.

Particularly moving were BK Shivani Didi's talks, which recharged her spirit and provided fresh perspectives every time she listened. Shivangi also delves into the relationship between silence and music, highlighting how music, despite being sound, can evoke peace and serve as a form of meditation. As a musician, she expresses how music connects her to a higher power, aligning closely with the serenity of silence.

Join us as Shivangi explores these themes of silence, music, and spirituality, and discover how they can enhance your own connection to the divine. Don't forget to like, comment, and subscribe for more uplifting content!

Title: Promo | Climate Wisdom Live Series from COP 29 in Baku | Brahma Kumaris
Description:
Brahma Kumaris presents the *Climate Wisdom Live Series*, a daily broadcast from the global COP 29 summit in Baku, uniting spiritual insights and scientific expertise on climate change. Each episode will feature Brahma Kumaris delegates sharing unique perspectives on how *consciousness can transform our approach to climate challenges*.

Date: 11th nov to 22nd Nov 2024
Time: 7 PM (AZT) | 3 PM (GMT) | 8:30 PM (IST) | 10 AM (EDT)

Highlights:
- Thought-provoking discussions with global leaders in spirituality and environmental science.
- Practical wisdom to inspire personal responsibility and positive action for our planet.
- Insights into how mindfulness, inner peace, and sustainable practices impact the environment.

Tune in daily for real-time updates, reflections, and a new vision for a sustainable world. Let’s elevate the climate conversation together!

Stay Connected | Subscribe Now to follow our journey at COP 29 and discover how inner transformation can drive lasting environmental change.

#COP29 #ClimateWisdom #BrahmaKumaris #ClimateChange #SustainableLiving #spiritualityandscience

Title: Diwali 2024: Lighting the Path to the Golden Age | Brahma Kumaris
Description:
✨ Diwali 2024: A Path to the Golden Age ✨

Join us as we celebrate Diwali, the festival of lights, with a unique perspective from Brahma Kumaris. Diwali symbolizes the victory of light over darkness, knowledge over ignorance, and peace over chaos. In this video, we explore how these timeless values pave the way to a "Golden Age," a vision of harmony, purity, and unity for all.

Discover the spiritual significance of Diwali through the lens of the Golden Age, where each soul reclaims its purest, most divine form. Let this be a reminder that each light lit this Diwali represents a personal commitment to peace, love, and truth.

🔔 Don’t forget to like, subscribe, and share to spread this message of light and positivity. Let’s create a brighter world together!

#brahmakumaris #diwali #festivaloflights

Title: Moments & Memories - Empowering the Self Retreat - October 2024 - Brahma Kumaris - Mansarovar
Description:
Join us for highlights from the 'Empower the Self' conference, a transformative 3-day event hosted by the IT Wing of the Brahma Kumaris at Mansarovar, Abu Road. Over 450 participants gathered to explore themes of wisdom, inner strength, and digital wellness through meditation, workshops, and inspirational talks from renowned speakers and experienced Rajyogis. Discover practical tools to live purposefully, embrace self-empowerment, and find balance in today’s fast-paced world. Watch now and get inspired to deepen your spiritual journey!"

Title: World Food Day 2024 - Eat For Peace & Live For Peace -  by BK Youth Rep. at UN
Description:
Discover how your daily food choices can promote peace in the world! 🌱 In this short video, the young representatives of Brahma Kumaris share insightful thoughts on how eating plant-based, local, and organic food contributes to sustainable farming, reduces cruelty, and spreads compassion. They explain how a healthy body and mind are connected to what’s on your plate, and how we can all create harmony for the planet and its living beings with every meal.

Watch now to learn how you can start with one plant-based meal a day and contribute to a healthier, more peaceful world! ✨

Title: Valedictory Ceremony : Bridging Science & Spirituality for Sustainable Development | 7 Oct, 08 AM
Description:
Join us for the "Valedictory Session" of the Global Summit 2024 on the theme "Bridging Science & Spirituality for Sustainable Development". This closing session brings together distinguished spiritual leaders and esteemed guests to reflect on the key insights shared throughout the summit and explore how science and spirituality can work hand in hand for a sustainable future.

Key Speakers:
- Shri Rajendra Shukla Ji – Hon'ble Deputy Chief Minister of Madhya Pradesh
- Rajyogini BK Munni Didi – Joint Chief of Brahma Kumaris  
- Rajyogi BK Brij Mohan – Secretary General of Brahma Kumaris  
- Rajyogi Dr. BK Mruthyunjaya – Executive Secretary of Brahma Kumaris  
- Ms. Sakshi Kamlapure – Founder of Youth Empowering Center & Living Values Trainer, Pune  

📅 Date: 7th October 2024  
🕗 Time: 8:00 AM IST  
📍 Location: Diamond Hall, Brahma Kumaris Headquarters, Shantivan, Abu Road  

Join us for this inspiring conclusion and witness a powerful blend of science, spirituality, and sustainability!

#GlobalSummit2024 #ValedictorySession #ScienceAndSpirituality #SustainableDevelopment #BrahmaKumaris #SpiritualWisdom #WorldPeace

Title: Plenary Session 5 | Holistic Healing:Merging Spirituality with Public Health | 06-10-2024 at 6.00 PM
Description:
Plenary Session 5 at the "Global Summit 2024", on the theme "Holistic Healing: Merging Spirituality with Public Health". This session will explore the integration of spiritual practices with modern healthcare for overall well-being and healing.

Key Speakers and Guests:
- Dr. Satish Gupta – Director, Trauma Center, Abu Road  
- Dr. Shrividya Muralidhar – Sourabha Sangeetha Nritya Kala Parishath, Mangalore  
- Dr. Punya Prasad Regmi – VC, Agricultural & Forestry University, Nepal  
- Dr. Vemuri Krishna – Doctor of Internal Medicine, Florida, USA  
- Rajyogini BK Asha Behn – Director, Om Shanti Retreat Center, Gurugram  
- Dr. Geeta Bora – Founder & Director, Spherule Foundation  
- Shri Abhishek Upadhyay – Sr. Political Editor, ABP News, Noida  
- Shri Sant Prasad Rai – Senior Journalist & Former VP, ABP News  
- Shri D.N. Prasad Garu – Editor-in-Chief, Eenadu Newspaper, Telangana Edition  
- Dr. Ittikorn Wattana – Innovative Integrated Life Energy Medicine Expert, Thailand  
- Prof. K.S. Rangappa – Scientist & Former VC, University of Mysore  

📅 Date: 6th October 2024  
🕕 Time: 6:00 PM IST  
📍 Location: Diamond Hall, Brahma Kumaris Headquarters, Shantivan, Abu Road  

Join us as we discuss how spirituality can support public health and promote holistic healing!

Title: Antim Yatra BK Nirwair Ji | 22 Dec Awakening TV | Brahma Kumaris
Description:
Join us in paying our heartfelt tributes as we live stream the final journey of our beloved and respected Rajyogi B.K. Nirwair Bhai Ji, a guiding light in spreading peace, love, and spiritual wisdom. Let us unite in love and meditation to honor his peaceful transition to the subtle region.

शांति, प्रेम और आध्यात्मिक ज्ञान का प्रसार करने वाले हमारे अति प्रिय और आदरणीय राजयोगी बी.के. निर्वैर भाई जी की अंतिम यात्रा के लाइव प्रसारण में शामिल होकर उन्हें अपनी श्रद्धांजलि अर्पित करें। आइए, ध्यान और प्रेम के साथ उनके इस शांतिमय सूक्ष्म यात्रा को सम्मानित करें।

#LastJourney #AntimYatra #BkNirwair #bahmakumaris

Title: Meditate with Sister Jayanti | International Day of Peace 2024 | Brahma Kumaris - Cultivating Peace
Description:
Join us for a special meditation session led by Sister Jayanti, Additional Administrative Head of the Brahma Kumaris, as we come together to honor the "International Day of Peace 2024". This global event invites you to reflect, meditate, and cultivate inner peace, contributing to a world of harmony and understanding. 

🕒 Live on Saturday, 21st September 2024
- 7:00 PM India
- 2:30 PM UK
- 9:30 AM New York
- 5:30 PM Dubai

Together, let's nurture a culture of peace through meditation.

Title: Brahma Kumaris Gyan Sarovar Academy, Nagarkot, Near Kathmandu, Nepal @brahmakumaris
Description:
Google Location:
https://maps.app.goo.gl/oQZxx3yx4QWrSDJU6

Nestled in the serene valley of the Himalayas, Brahma Kumaris Gyan Sarovar Academy in Nagarkot, Nepal, offers a tranquil retreat for meditation and self-discovery. Surrounded by breathtaking mountain views, this beautiful center invites visitors to experience inner peace and spiritual growth through the teachings of Raja Yoga meditation. A true haven for those seeking clarity and connection, Gyan Sarovar Academy provides an idyllic setting for reflection and renewal amidst nature's splendor.

Address: Brahma Kumaris Gyan Sarovar Academy, Nagarkot, Kathmandu, Nepal

https://brahmakumarisnepal.org.np/

Title: A Year of Spiritual Growth: Anup Dhingra’s Experience with Brahma Kumaris : Marsh India
Description:
In this video, Anup Dhingra from Mumbai shares his experience with Brahma Kumaris. He and his wife Puja have been connected with us for the past year. Ano talks about how this journey started by chance and became something truly special.

Before joining Brahma Kumaris, Ano tried different spiritual practices But through Brahma Kumaris, he found a unique combination of knowledge, meditation, and the importance of helping others.

This experience taught him that life is not just about balancing time, but about balancing energy. When our energy is strong, we can do better in our work, our relationships, and in helping others.

He also shares how being part of Brahma Kumaris helped him realize that there is more to life than just seeking material success. Talking to others on this path, he learned the importance of making a positive impact, no matter how small our role might be.

We hope this story inspires you

To Learn Rajyoga Meditation, Visit Nearest Meditation Center

Title: Glimpses of Dadi Prakashmani Mount Abu International Half Marathon 2024 - Brahma Kumaris
Description:
Experience the excitement and inspiration of the Dadi Prakashmani Mount Abu International Half Marathon! 🏃‍♂️🏃‍♀️ Held in the serene surroundings of Mount Abu, this annual marathon celebrates health, fitness, and spirituality, bringing together runners from across the globe. Named in honor of Dadi Prakashmani, the beloved spiritual leader of the Brahma Kumaris, this event promotes inner peace, unity, and well-being.

📸 Watch the highlights of this remarkable event, where participants ran with purpose, strength, and dedication, reflecting the teachings of Dadi Prakashmani. From stunning mountain views to heartfelt moments, this marathon is more than just a race—it's a journey of empowerment and spiritual growth. ✨

🙏 Organized by Brahma Kumaris
🌍 Uniting the world through peace, love, and health.

Don't forget to like, share, and subscribe for more inspirational content! 💬

Empowering the Self is a gift that we can give to ourselves in the present times when rapid external changes demand a stable inner anchor. 

This conference/retreat offers:
•⁠  ⁠Insightful Sessions

•⁠  ⁠Quiet time for self-reflection & activities

Title: Subah - Satvic Movment - My Experience at Brahma Kumaris
Description:
Join us on a heartfelt journey to the Mount Abu, the headquarters of the Brahma Kumaris, where we spent three transformative days. In this video, we share our profound experiences and the key takeaways that will stay with us for years to come.

From the moment we arrived, we were enveloped by the warmth and compassion of everyone we met, whether it was the sisters who helped maintain the campus or those who delivered insightful lectures. Their genuine love and dedication truly brought the spirit of the campus to life.

The serene environment, nestled amidst lush mountains, provided the perfect backdrop for deep meditation and self-reflection. It allowed us to disconnect from our busy lives and reconnect with our true selves. The teachings at the center, particularly the practice of Raj Yoga meditation, helped us explore profound truths about our identity and the nature of the soul.

We were also deeply moved by the Brothers and Sisters commitment to nurturing both the body and the spirit. The delicious and energizing food, prepared with love and intention, was a testament to this holistic approach. Our exploration of the various parts of the campus, including Shantivan, Tapovan, and Pandav Bhawan, revealed the rich history and dedication that have shaped this spiritual haven.

This experience has taught us that true empowerment comes from within, and we have the power to control our thoughts and emotions. We invite you to join us in this journey of self-discovery and peace, and encourage you to visit the Mount Abu Center to experience this divine energy firsthand.

Title: Lily's Inward Journey | A Moment to Meditate | Short Animation Film | Brahmakumaris @brahmakumaris
Description:
In the bustling city, Lily, a high-achieving young professional, seeks solace amid her fast paced chaotic life. With the devine blessings bestowed on her,  met a divine angel at Brahmakumaris. Lily discovers that true fulfillment lies in inner peace along with external success. Embracing the practice of pausing in her fast pace life, she finds serenity within herself, illuminating the transformative power of inner peace. "Taking a Pause" is a captivating animated journey depicting Lily's quest for harmony and inner peace amidst life's tumult.

www.shantisarovar.org

Title: Nanhe Nanhe Haath नन्हे नन्हे हाथ | New Song for Children | Brahma Kumaris @brahmakumaris
Description:
Song Name: Nanhe Nanhe Haath
Presented by: Brahma Kumaris & Education Wing (RERF)

Produced by: BK Mruthyunjaya
Music Composer: Milind Wankhede
Lyrics: BK Satish Bhai “Saral”
Song Supervision: Harish Moyal
Vocal: Nitya Moyal, Ira Rohan Tikekar, Kaamya Vijay, Arraddhya Nambiar, Kabir Narang
Guitar/Bass Guitar: Abhishekh Gupta 
Keyboard: Dev Moyal 
Mix Master: Hemant Khedkar 
Production Manager: Pooja Bedi
Special Thanks to The Culture Cove - Rajeswari Venkataraman
A HM Studios Production
---------------------
Lyrics: 

नन्हे नन्हे हाथ हमारे, अंबर तक ले जाएंगे
प्यारे प्यारे सारे तारे, हम जमीं पर लाएंगे (x2)

भारत नया बनाएंगे, हम दुनिया नई बनाएंगे (x3)

हम फूलों सा, है हस्ते हैं, कलियों सा मुस्काते हैं
हम बच्चे ही दुनिया की बगिया को मेहकाते हैं

स्वर्णिम भारत के हम बच्चे, आशा और विश्वास हैं
नए जगत का लिखने वाले, हम उज्ज्वल इतिहास हैं (x2)

जो कोई न कर सकता है, हम करके दिखलाएंगे
भारत नया बनाएंगे, हम दुनिया नई बनाएंगे (x3)

हम प्रह्लाद, ध्रुव, नचिकेता, काल भी हमसे हारा है
ठान लिया तो मान के इश्वर, साथी बना हमारा है (x2)

खुदा दोस्त बन, हर सिरहाने हम खुशियाँ धर आयेंगे
भारत नया बनाएंगे, हम दुनिया नई बनाएंगे (x3)

सच्चे सच्चे है हम बच्चे, झूठ नहीं हम कहते 
नन्हे वही फ़रिश्ते हम, हरदम हस्ते रहते

मत समझो छोटी काया, हम करने वाले कमाल हैं 
निर्मल हंसी खुशी से, जग करने वाले खुशहाल हैं (x2) 

सबके सिर पर ताज होगा, देव-देवी बन जाएंगे
भारत नया बनाएंगे, हम दुनिया नई बनाएंगे (x3)

--------------------------------

Nanhe nanhe haath humare, ambar tak le jayenge
Pyare pyare sare tare, hum jameen par layenge (x2)

Bharat naya banayenge, hum duniya nai banayenge (x3)

Hum phoolon sa, hai haste hain, kaliyon sa muskate hain
Hum bachche hi duniya ki bagiya ko mehakate hain

Swarnim bharat ke hum bachche, Asha aur vishvaas hain
Naye jagat ka likhane wale, hum ujjval itihaas hain (x2)
Jo koi na kar sakta hai, hum karke dikhlayenge
Bharat naya banayenge, hum duniya nai banayenge (x3)

Hum Prahlad, Dhruv, Nachiketa, kaal bhi humse hara hai
Thaan liya to, maan ke ishvar, sathi bana humara hai (x2)
Khuda dost ban, har sirahaane hum khushiyaan dhar aayenge
Bharat naya banayenge, hum duniya nai banayenge (x3)

Sachche sachche hai hum bachche, jhooth nahin hum kehte
Nanhe wahi farishte hum, haradam haste rehte

Mat samjho chhoti kaya, hum karne wale kamal hain
Nirmal hansi khushi se, jag karne wale khushhaal hain (x2)
Sabke sir par taj hoga, dev-devi ban jayenge
Bharat naya banayenge, hum duniya nai banayenge (x3)

-----------------------------------------------

Title: समापन सत्र:- विषय: स्वर्णिम, सशक्त एवं आत्मनिर्भर भारत का पुन:निर्माण | 15-06-2024 | सायं 06.30
Description:
भारतीय कृषि दर्शन एवं सम्यूर्ण ग्राम विकास प्रभाग
दिनांक: 13 से 17 जून, 2024, 
स्थान: ब्रह्माकुमारीज़, ज्ञान सरोवर, माउण्ट आबू (राजस्थान)  आयोजक : कृषि एवं ग्राम विकास प्रभाग  राजयोग एज्यूकेशन एण्ड रिसर्च फाउण्डेशन एवं प्रजापिता ब्रह्माकुमारी ईश्वरीय विश्व विद्यालय  

समापन सत्र:-

Description:
भारतीय कृषि दर्शन एवं सम्यूर्ण ग्राम विकास प्रभाग
दिनांक: 13 से 17 जून, 2024, 
स्थान: ब्रह्माकुमारीज़, ज्ञान सरोवर, माउण्ट आबू (राजस्थान)  आयोजक : कृषि एवं ग्राम विकास प्रभाग  राजयोग एज्यूकेशन एण्ड रिसर्च फाउण्डेशन एवं प्रजापिता ब्रह्माकुमारी ईश्वरीय विश्व विद्यालय  

13 जून गुरुवार, 2024  
स्वागत एवं उदघाटन सत्र:-विषयः भारतीय कृषि दर्शन एवं सम्पूर्ण ग्राम विकास
समय सायं 06.00 से 08.00 
स्थानः हॉरमनी हॉल, 
विषयः भारतीय कृषि दर्शन एवं सम्पूर्ण ग्राम विकास  
आशर्वचन : राजयोगिनी ब्रह्माकुमारी सुदेश दीदी जी,संयुक्त मुख्य प्रशासिका, बह्माकुमारीज़,माउण्ट आबू  
अध्य्ष ः ब्रह्माकुमार वृजमोहन भाई जी, एडिशनल सेक्रेटरी जनरल.,ब्रहाकुमारीज़,माउण्ट आबू  'व्रह्माकुमार राजू भाई जी,उपाध्यक्ष, कृषि एखवं य्राम विकास प्रभाग माउण्ट आबू  स्वागत प्रवचन  
मु्य वक्ता  ः ब्रह्माकुमार वद्री विशाल भाई, असिस्टेन्ट डायरेक्टर, कृषि निदेशालय, लखनऊ  द्घाटक ; भ्राता किरोडीलाल मीणा जी,माननीय कृषि एवंग्रम विकास मंत्री, राजस्थान सरकार,जयपुर  
अतिथि : भ्राता डॉ.अजीत कुमार कर्नाटक, कुलपति,  महाराणा प्रताप 'कृषि विश्वविद्यालय, उदयपुर  
अतिथि : भ्राता प्रो.वी.आर.चौधरी, कुलपति, कृषि विश्वविद्यालय,जोधपुर  शुभ कामनाएं  ब्रह्माकुमारी सरला दीदी जी, अध्यक्षा, कृषि एखवं ग्राम विकास प्रभाग. महेसाना  
शुभ कामनाएं : व्रह्मकुमारी सुनन्दा वहन, नेशनल कोआर्डिनेटर, कृषि एखवं य्राम विकास प्रभाग, पूणे  
आभार ः व्रह्माकुमार सुमन्त भाई, मुख्यालय संयोजक, कृषि एवं ग्राम विकास प्रभाग, माउण्ट आबू  ईश्वरीय उपहार  
मंच संचालन ः ब्रह्माकुमारी तृप्ती वहन, नेशनल कोआर्डिनेटर,कृषि एवं ग्राम विकास प्रभाग,

Title: विश्व पर्यावरण दिवस के अवसर पर ब्रह्माकुमारीज शांतिवन द्वारा वृक्ष वंदन कार्यक्रम
Sister Jayanti's Greetings of Peace for World Environment Day 2024
Description:
Join us as Sister Jayanti delivers a heartfelt greeting of peace on World Environment Day. 🌍✨

Brahma Kumaris is actively engaged in numerous environmental projects that contribute to the well-being of our planet. Discover initiatives like:

Kalptaruh: A movement focused on tree plantation to create a greener future.
Arogyavan: Healing places dedicated to restoring health through nature.
Yogik Farming: Innovative farming practices that promote soil restoration and use spiritual energy to nurture crops.
Sister Jayanti emphasizes the importance of ecosystem restoration and the crucial role each of us plays in protecting and nurturing our environment. Let's join hands and make a positive impact on our planet together.

For more information on our projects and how you can get involved, visit Brahma Kumaris Official Website.

#WorldEnvironmentDay #SisterJayanti #BrahmaKumaris #Kalptaruh #Arogyavan #YogikFarming #EcosystemRestoration #PeaceAndNature #EnvironmentalInitiatives #HealingTheEarth

Title: Tobacco Kills - Dr. Sachin Parab's Message on World No-Tobacco Day - Brahma Kumaris
Description:
On World No-Tobacco Day, join us in listening to an enlightening message from Dr. Sachin Parab, shedding light on the dangers of tobacco consumption and its detrimental effects on health. Dr. Parab, a renowned expert in public health, delivers a powerful discourse on the alarming statistics, health risks, and social impacts associated with tobacco use.

This insightful message aims to raise awareness and inspire positive change in individuals and communities worldwide. Together, let's take a stand against tobacco and strive for a healthier, tobacco-free future for all.

Watch the full video to gain valuable insights and join the movement towards a smoke-free world. Don't forget to like, share, and subscribe for more empowering content!

#WorldNoTobaccoDay #QuitSmoking #HealthAwareness #BrahmaKumaris #DrSachinParab #SayNoToTobacco

06.30 pm- 07.30 pm  : Mass Meditation with Senior Yogis at Dadi Janki Park

04.00 pm - 06.00 pm : Plenary Session-I  Topic: Vision and Mission for a Value-based Society मूल्यनिष्ठ समाज के लिए दृष्टि और उद्देश्य
06.30 pm - 07.45 pm : Insight Session-I Topic  : Manage Work Pressure with Pleasure
काम के दबाव को आनन्द के साथ प्रबंधित करें
08:45 pm - 10.15 pm  : Cultural Programme 
Day 3: Saturday, 25th May 2024 06.45 am - 08.15 am  : Raja Yoga Meditation Session - III Topic  : Understanding the Supreme Being सर्वोच्च सत्ता की पहचान
10.00 am - 12.00 pm  : Plenary Session-II     Topic  : Spiritual Intelligence vs. Artificial Intelligence
आध्यात्मिक बुद्धिमत्ता बनाम कृत्रिम बुद्धिमत्ता
 01.00 pm - 07.30 pm :  Sight-Seeing of Mt.Abu & Entertainment at Peace Park
 Day 4: Sunday, 26th May  2024  06.45 am - 08.15 am  : Raja Yoga Meditation Session-IV Topic  : The Art & Science of Raja Yoga 
राजयोग की कला और विज्ञान
 09:30 am – 11.00 am : Talk Show Topic  : Need for Spiritual Wisdom in Professional Discipline  व्यावसायिक अनुशासन में आध्यात्मिक ज्ञान की आवश्यकता
11.15 am – 01.15 pm : Valedictory Session Topic  : Role of Media for Restoring New Social Order नई सामाजिक व्यवस्था की पुनर्स्थापना में मीडिया की भूमिका

04.30 pm - 06.00 pm : Insight Session-II Topic : Self-Empowerment with God’s Wisdom 
ईश्वरीय प्रज्ञा से आत्म सशक्तिकरण
06.30 pm- 07.30 pm  : Mass Meditation with Senior Yogis at Dadi Janki Park 
Day 5: Monday, 27th May 2024 06.45 am - 08.15 am  : Raja Yoga Meditation Session-V  Topic  : Invoke Your Inner Powers आंतरिक शक्तियों का आह्वान
09.30 am onwards   : Departure for a New Beginning

Title: Brahma Kumaris at Global Spiritual Mahotsav, Hyderabad @brahmakumaris
Description:
Global Spirituality Mahotsav - Inner Peace to World Peace 

To honor India's unique role and contribution in inspiring spiritual pursuits globally, Ministry of Culture is organizing the Global Spirituality Mahotsav-2024 as a special initiative in this auspicious Amrit Kaal at Kanha Shanti Vanam, Hyderabad, Telangana from 14-17 March 2024.

Brahma Kumaris was one of the Core Committee Institutions of this Mahotsav hosted by Heartfulness, Hyderabad.

Title: The Power of Peace: Reflective Experiences at Mount Abu : Empowering the Self Retreat
Description:
🌟 Ashish Kapoor & Meghana Kapoor credits their transformative experience to a visit to Mount Abu, which provided both knowledge and tools to live a more soul-conscious life.

🌿 The serene environment of Mount Abu is highlighted as a place of peace and beauty, enhancing the collective meditation experience with its calming and inspiring atmosphere.

🍲 Emphasis is placed on the unique dining experience where the food is described as delicious, light, yet fulfilling, and cooked with love, emotions, and blessings.

🙏 The speaker appreciates the spiritual activities, especially the morning meditation session called "Amrit Vela" at 4:00 AM, which is pointed out as a game-changer for mental clarity and spiritual energy.

👥 Meeting new people and attending sessions at Mount Abu has significantly impacted him, providing new perspectives on handling life situations more effectively.

🙌 The speaker expresses gratitude towards the individuals at the retreat, mentioning the positive energy and harmony that contributed to the blissful experience.

💭 The teachings from the retreat are praised for their practical application in everyday life, including techniques for energizing water and food, which are now daily practices.

This retreat not only enriched the speaker's personal life but also provided profound insights and tools that improved their professional and familial relationships.

All Session :

Title: A Journey of Self-Discovery : Monica's Spiritual Awakening with Brahma Kumaris : Gyan Sarovar
Description:
🌟 Monica, based in Pune and working as a senior Power Platform consultant at Michelin, shares her spiritual journey.
🌟 She discusses her self-reflection process, entering her 30s, and evaluating her inner and external life accomplishments.
🌟 Inspired by her mother and aunt, Monica embarked on meditation and spirituality, experiencing a profound transformation.
🌟 She describes her visit to a spiritual campus as a life-changing event, bringing inner peace and a sense of divine connection.
🌟 Monica expresses gratitude towards her family and spiritual guides, committing to spread her newfound wisdom and experiences.

Title: Digital Wellness - Empowering the Self : 2024 | 14th Apr
Description:
►Copyright : Brahma Kumaris

Empowering the Self
Inner Resilience leads to Outer Agility
A refreshing spiritual retreat in a beautiful, nature-inspired campus, nestled amidst the majestic Aravali mountain ranges in Mt. Abu.

"Empowering the Self’’ Retreats aim to create such safe, silent and reflective spaces, in the lap of nature to help you relax, reflect, recharge and become more resilient. We believe inner resilience is the foundation for outer agility.

To lay a foundation for inner resilience, this 3-day inner journey would explore

How do I stabilize my mind so that I can utilize my brain better?
How do I create an oasis of certainty amidst an ocean of ambiguity?
How do I become worriless ?
How do I increase the awareness of the present to reduce the uncertainty of the future?
How do I nurture a vision for a better me?

Watch “#BrahmaKumaris – Program.."

Title: Moments & Memories - Empowering the Self Retreat - April 2024 - Brahma Kumaris - Gyan Sarovar
Description:
🌟 Experience the essence of leadership and spirituality in our exclusive 7-minute video from the serene Leadership Retreat for IT Professionals at Gyan Sarovar, Mount Abu. Dive into a series of enlightening sessions, heartfelt guidance, and inspiring leadership talks, all captured amidst the breathtaking surroundings of our beautiful campus.

All Video Playlist - Empowering the Self Retreat:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL5kAxoG6fPDgsYPXo6aUl6x_hjkEhOpF0

🕯️ Witness the magic of group meditation in the amphitheater and park, where each participant meditated with a candle in hand during the enchanting evening hours. This video not only showcases the spiritual sessions but also highlights the tireless efforts of our volunteers in food preparation, stage setup, registration, and more, ensuring a flawless experience for all attendees.

🎥 Relive the moments that touched the hearts of many and left a lasting impression. This is more than just a retreat; it's a journey into the heart of leadership and communal harmony. Don’t forget to like, comment, and share to keep the inspiration flowing!

#LeadershipRetreat #ITProfessionals #Spirituality #GyanSarovar #LeadershipDevelopment #Meditation #Volunteering

Title: Take a Pause | A Short Animation Film Towards Inner Peace | Brahma Kumaris | Pace, Pause, Peace
Description:
"TAKE A PAUSE" | A Short Animation Film Towards Inner Peace | Pace, Pause, Peace

In the bustling city, Lily, a high-achieving young professional, seeks solace amid her fast paced chaotic life. With the devine blessings bestowed on her,  met a divine angel at Brahmakumaris. Lily discovers that true fulfillment lies in inner peace along with external success. Embracing the practice of pausing in her fast pace life, she finds serenity within herself, illuminating the transformative power of inner peace. "Taking a Pause" is a captivating animated journey depicting Lily's quest for harmony and inner peace amidst life's tumult

Created by: Brahma Kumaris Shanti Sarovar, Hyderabad

Title: Global Spirituality Mahotsav (Valedictory) - Shri Jagdeep Dhankhar, BK Mruthyunjaya @brahmakumaris
Description:
Valedictory Session "Inner Peace to World Peace" at Kanha Shantivanam, Hyderabad (16-03-2024)

Speakers:
🌟 Shri Jagdeep Dhankhar, Hon. Vice President of India

Title: Brahma Kumaris Peace Village - Learning & Retreat Centre | USA @brahmakumaris
Description:
Google Location: https://maps.app.goo.gl/BaPmuiSNZy279Rey7

Peace Village is one of the Brahma Kumaris Retreat Centres in the US. Situated on the Catskill Mountain in New York’s breath taking Hudson Valley, Peace Village is an ideal spot for those who seek silence, peace and spiritual learning. Due to it’s proximity to nature, one experiences an instant sense of tranquility and a feeling of one with nature after reaching the campus. The campus is spread across 6 building in 300 acres of woods and streams. Peace Village welcomes thousands of national and international visitors annually. Peace Village is located at 54 O’hara Rd., PO Box 99, Haines Falls, New York 

Website: http://www.peacevillageretreat.org/

#brahmakumaris  #peacevillage

Created by: Nicolas Crettex

Title: Brahma Kumaris' Youth Wing members meeting Hon.President of India, Smt. Droupadi Murmu
Description:
